sub_title: IR Graduate with a Green Heart: Building Collaborative Synergies for Sustainable Development | Seeking Opportunities to Drive Positive Change | üá™üá∫üáÆüáπüá©üá™
summary:
Highly motivated recent graduate with a strong academic background in European Studies and International Relations. Dedicated to promoting interdisciplinary knowledge for effective governance and sustainable development. I have a keen interest in international cooperation & development, humanitarian affairs, security, and sustainability. Passionate about making a positive impact, I am seeking exciting entry-level opportunities in the field of sustainable development to contribute my skills and drive positive change.

My diverse experience in various sectors has equipped me with adaptability and determination to excel in challenging environments. I possess strong research, analysis, and communication skills, which allow me to critically assess complex issues and propose innovative solutions. 

If you are seeking a motivated and versatile professional who is committed to making a difference, let's connect and explore how we can collaborate to achieve meaningful outcomes. Together, we can contribute to sustainable development and create a more equitable and interconnected world.

projects:
[{'title': '‚ÄúDeveloping a Healthy Media Environment in Albania‚Äù', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'description': "The Developing a Healthy Media Environment in Albania (DHMEA) project is a 3-year initiative proposal aimed at improving the media landscape in Albania. The project seeks to address the challenges faced by the country's media sector, including political interference, weak institutional frameworks, and limited media independence.

By promoting good governance, transparency, and accountability, DHMEA aims to enhance the professionalism of journalism and strengthen the relationship between the media and the government. Through capacity-building activities, the project aims to improve media management and professionalism, ensuring higher-quality reporting and adherence to ethical standards and media codes of conduct.

DHMEA also emphasizes the importance of information accuracy and reliability, working towards improving the quality of information provided to the public. By promoting transparency, accountability, and the rule of law, the project aims to create a healthier media environment that fosters democratic values and supports Albania's progress towards European Union accession.

Through collaborative efforts and partnerships with key stakeholders in the media sector, DHMEA strives to create a sustainable and independent media landscape in Albania, where media outlets can operate freely, journalists can work with integrity, and the public can access accurate and unbiased information.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Alessio', 'last_name': 'Misseri, MA', 'name': None, 'headline': 'IR Graduate with a Green Heart: Building Collaborative Synergies for Sustainable Development | Seeking Opportunities to Drive Positive Change | üá™üá∫üáÆüáπüá©üá™'}]}, {'title': 'Saudi Women‚Äôs Migration: A Research-Symposium on Socio-Cultural Inequalities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'description': 'This research and symposium shed light on the profound influence of social and cultural inequality in Saudi Arabia on the decision of women to seek asylum, despite the implementation of recent empowerment reforms. Through an interdisciplinary approach, the study explores the multifaceted dimensions of inequality faced by Saudi women, examining societal norms, gender roles, legal frameworks, and cultural barriers. It delves into the paradoxical situation where empowerment reforms coexist with persistent social and cultural disparities that often push women to seek asylum for safety and freedom.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Alessio', 'last_name': 'Misseri, MA', 'name': None, 'headline': 'IR Graduate with a Green Heart: Building Collaborative Synergies for Sustainable Development | Seeking Opportunities to Drive Positive Change | üá™üá∫üáÆüáπüá©üá™'}]}, {'title': 'HIV Treatment in Mdantsane, South Africa - Taking Action for HIV', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': 'As part of a research initiative, I collaborated with a team of dedicated students to design and develop an organization focused on supporting HIV treatment. Our project aimed to address the challenges faced by a community in South Africa living with HIV and enhance their access to comprehensive care and support.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Alessio', 'last_name': 'Misseri, MA', 'name': None, 'headline': 'IR Graduate with a Green Heart: Building Collaborative Synergies for Sustainable Development | Seeking Opportunities to Drive Positive Change | üá™üá∫üáÆüáπüá©üá™'}]}, {'title': 'The Impact of Foreign Investments on Human Rights in South Sudan: Exploitation of National Resources and Exacerbation of the Humanitarian Crisis', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': 'This group research project presents a situational analysis of the impact of foreign investments on human rights in South Sudan, focusing on the exploitation of national and agricultural resources by land-grabbing entities. The research reveals that the involvement of foreign investors, particularly in the agricultural and oil sectors, has significantly intensified the gravity of the humanitarian crisis in the country.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Alessio', 'last_name': 'Misseri, MA', 'name': None, 'headline': 'IR Graduate with a Green Heart: Building Collaborative Synergies for Sustainable Development | Seeking Opportunities to Drive Positive Change | üá™üá∫üáÆüáπüá©üá™'}]}]
